title: Define System Architecture
description: Design the overall structure of SmartFarmingDrones system, including hardware, software, and communication protocols.

title: Develop Autonomous Navigation System
description: Create an autonomous navigation system for drones that can map fields and fly over them efficiently. The system should take into account the field size, terrain, crop type, and weather conditions. Include real-time adjustments to optimize resource use in response to these variables.

title: Implement Crop Health Monitoring Sensors (Updated)
description: Design and integrate sensors into the drones to monitor crop health parameters such as moisture, temperature, color, and light intensity. This includes selecting appropriate sensors for each parameter, configuring them for optimal performance, interfacing with the main drone system, and considering calibration methods for consistent data collection. Additionally, specify the communication protocol between the sensors and the main drone system.

title: Optimize Resource Allocation Algorithms in SmartFarmingDrones (Revised)
description: Develop algorithms to optimize resource use in agriculture based on the collected crop health data. The goal is to ensure efficient and optimal utilization of resources to maximize crop yield, focusing on precision agriculture principles and machine learning techniques.

title: Create User Interface for Data Visualization (with modifications)
description: Design an intuitive and responsive interface to visualize the collected crop health data, optimized resource allocation, and provide insights on overall farm performance. The UI should be user-friendly, able to handle large datasets efficiently, and incorporate real-time updates for dynamic data. Additionally, consider implementing a feature to compare historical data for trend analysis.

title: Develop Quality Assurance Plan
description: Create a comprehensive plan to ensure the quality of the SmartFarmingDrones system throughout its development. The plan should cover all aspects, including functional and non-functional testing, performance benchmarking, code reviews, and quality gates for each stage of development (design, development, integration, and deployment).

title: Perform Security Audit of the System
description: Conduct a thorough security audit to ensure the SmartFarmingDrones system is secure against potential vulnerabilities.
